sources.title: Old Ironsides (1926) Excerpt
sources.description: Naval battle sequence from "Old Ironsides" (1926);Â  starring Charles Farrell, Wallace Beery, Esther Ralston; set in the War with Tripoli circa 1804. The action is overly-hyper and brazenly inauthentic, yet here and there some small but nice historical touches interspersed amid the Hollywood-brand chaos and riot. William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.mn-hp.com

metadata.Plot: Early in the 19th century, the USS Constitution is launched as part of an effort to stop piracy in the Mediterranean. Meanwhile, a young man determined to go to sea is befriended by the bos'n of the merchant ship Esther, and he joins her crew. When the Esther reaches the Mediterranean, she too, along with the Constitution, becomes involved in the battle against the pirates.
metadata.Writer: Laurence Stallings, Harry Carr, Walter Woods
metadata.Actors: Charles Farrell, Esther Ralston, Wallace Beery
